text: Hey there! I'm doing really well right now - just starting my journey as a tiny seedling breaking through my seed coat. The temperature feels absolutely perfect for my early growth, and I'm loving how moist and comfortable my soil feels. The lighting is just right too, nice and gentle as I work on developing my first little roots and shoots. I could use just a touch more humidity in the air around me, but overall I'm feeling pretty happy and healthy as I begin this exciting phase of sprouting!

temperature.message: Temperature is perfect for germination phase.

humidity.message: Humidity is slightly below optimal for germination phase.

light.message: Light is perfect for germination phase.

soil_moisture.message: Soil Moisture is perfect for germination phase.
